Query.Title: Returns All Changes To An Item Over Time In Compustat Point-In-Time

The query represents an abbreviated time series in that it does not return all datadates and pointdates for the item: It only returns datadates and pointdates for when there is an original value or a change. Note:This query specifically identifies original values and changes to quarterly sales for GVKEY 001487.The mnemonic and GVKEY can be changed to run for other items and companies
